page.title: 17RECREATION Games
page.content: We play the usual games, football, netball, cricket and rounders. During the Summer we play a special Sussex game{Stoolball.}The rules are very simple. There are two wickets with a distance of seven metres between them. One side bowls and the other bats, runs are scored alternately, and the person whose wicket is hit is out. They can also be caught or run out. In the{playground}we play Dungeons and Dragons, Dungeons and Dragons chess, Hunt the Fox, Red Rover and British Bulldog.The boys often play football,while the girls usually skip, talk, play hopscotch or practice gym. Burgess Hill has many computer shops and people buy games to use on their home computers. We are expected to make use of our computers to support the work we do in school.This includes the playing of{computer games.
